commits.message:
IAM policy evaluation cleanup for resource policies - EUCA-5250

RestrictedIdentity is removed, the functionality provided by this class
is now in RestrictedTypes. The policy for a resource can now be accessed
from that resource (RestrictedType).

The TokensService is updated to use RestrictedTypes.

EUCA-5250

IAM instance profile support - EUCA-5250

Support is added for IAM instance profile CRUD including assignment of
roles to instance profiles.

An InstanceProfileEntity is added for persistence along with a related
InstanceProfile interface and DatabaseInstanceProfileProxy
implementation.

EuareService and Privileged are updated to support the instance profile
operations.

Roles and Accounts are updated to allow listing of related instance
profiles.

Instance profile related messages and bindings are updated to support
the custom account delegation parameter.

An InstanceProfileNumberQuotaKey is added for support of instance
profile quotas.

Prinipals is updated to clean up the implementation of system accounts.

EUCA-5250

STS assume role external ID support - EUCA-5250

Assume role policies now support use of an external ID. When an external
ID is available it is stored using ExternalIdContext, evaluation of the
policy key ExternalIdKey will use the contextual value.

EUCA-5250

IAM / STS changes for assume role support - EUCA-5250

IAM policy support is added for policies attached to resources,
previously only policies attached to identities were supported. Resource
attached policies must specify a Princial/NotPrincipal. Policy parsing
now requires that the user specify the expected attachment type for
validation purposes.

Principal, PrincipalEntity, and DatabasePrincipalProxy are added for
principal support with policies. StatementEntity is updated to reference
the contained principal.

The policy engine and Permissions are updated to support evaluation of
resource attached policies and to allow inter-account resource denials.

A new RestrictedIdentity utility class is added along the lines of
RestrictedTypes but supporting resource attached policies.

PolicySpec now supports canonicalization of resource names which may or
may not be case sensitive depending on the vendor.

The DatabasePolicyProxy now support access to the authorizations for a
policy.

The TokensService is updated to enforce assume role policies.

Accounts now exposes utility methods for identity ARN construction.

EUCA-5250

IAM roles crud and partial implementation of STS assume role - EUCA-5250

Support is added for IAM roles and a partial STS implementation of
issuing credentials for assuming roles.

Euare and token service bindings and PolicySpec are updated to support
the new operations. EuareService is updated with implementations for
role operation and stubs for instance profile operations.

Role, RoleEntity and DatabaseRoleProxy are added for role support.
Account and Privileged are updated with support for roles. RoleUser is
added for use when invoking operations with an assumed role.

TokensService and SecurityTokenManager are updated with a partial
implementation of the assume role operation. Roles can be assumed but
assume role policies are not currently supported/enforced.

Ern is updated to support ARNs for roles. RoleNumberQuotaKey is added to
support quotas for roles.

The EuareReplyQueue and EuareException are moved to the euare module for
improved modularity.

Account is updated to allow lookup of the admin user. Lookup of the
admin user by name is replaced with the new method where appropriate.

EUCA-5250
